actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill conferring jurisdiction upon the United States Court of Claims to hear, determine, and render judgment upon the claim of James W. Brundage.

summary.text: Confers jurisdiction upon the United States Claims Court, notwithstanding any time limitations, to hear and render judgment upon any claims of a named individual for military backpay due him as a result of nonpromotion in the U.S. Air Force.

titles.title: A bill conferring jurisdiction upon the United States Court of Claims to hear, determine, and render judgment upon the claim of James W. Brundage.
